thread.title: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener
thread.title_full: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener

title: Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener
text:
> Top News Steele narrowly hangs onto lead at PGA Tour season opener Emiliano Grillo, of Argentina, putts on the 18th green of the Silverado Resort North Course during the third round of the Frys.com golf tournament Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, in Napa, Calif. (AP Photo/Eric Risberg) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
